flawed_nl_solution:
Tina has already cleaned one key so she has 14 left which take 3 minutes each to clean, 14 x 3 = <<14*3=42>>42 minutes to clean all the keyboard keys.
Her assignment will take 10 minutes to complete, so she needs 42 minutes + 10 minutes = 57 minutes total before dinner.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 52, not 57. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
